text: Bamboo-shaped sake bottle (tokkuri), stoneware with brown and white glazes, Edo period, late 17th-early 18th century is a type of Japanese pottery traditionally from Arao, Kumamoto. == External links == * http://www.mingei- okumura.com/fs/mingei/c/syoudai Category:Culture in Kumamoto Prefecture Category:Japanese pottery
title: Shōdai ware
